column5: SOLID The five principles are as follows: S – Single Responsibility Principle (SRP) O – Open Closed Principle (OCP) L – Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP) I – Interface Segregation Principle (ISP) D – Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP)SOLID Design Principles Tech Champ ?.
column6:
The five principles are as follows:

S – Single Responsibility Principle (SRP)
O – Open Closed Principle (OCP)
L – Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP)
I – Interface Segregation Principle (ISP)
D – Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP)

column5: Playwright Playwright is a framework for Web Testing and Automation. It allows testing Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single APIhttps://playwright.dev/ Tech Champ ?.

column5: Power Automate formerly Microsoft Flow, is an online tool within the Microsoft 365 applications and add-ins, used for the creation of automated workflows between apps and services to synchronize files, get notifications, and collect data.https://powerautomate.microsoft.com/en-gb/ Tech Champ Simon.
column6: formerly Microsoft Flow, is an online tool within the Microsoft 365 applications and add-ins, used for the creation of automated workflows between apps and services to synchronize files, get notifications, and collect data.

column5: Power Apps allows you to build time-saving workflows into everything from individual tasks to large-scale systems with seamless integration using hundreds of prebuilt connectors.https://powerapps.microsoft.com/en-gb/ Tech Champ Simon.
column6: allows you to build time-saving workflows into everything from individual tasks to large-scale systems with seamless integration using hundreds of prebuilt connectors.

column5: Purview is a unified data governance solution that helps you manage and govern your on-premises, multicloud, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data. Easily create a holistic, up-to-date map of your data landscape with automated data discovery, sensitive data classification, and end-to-end data lineage. Enable data consumers to find valuable, trustworthy data. Tech Champ ?.
column6: is a unified data governance solution that helps you manage and govern your on-premises, multicloud, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data. Easily create a holistic, up-to-date map of your data landscape with automated data discovery, sensitive data classification, and end-to-end data lineage. Enable data consumers to find valuable, trustworthy data.

column5: nService Bus is an implementation of a 'service bus' pattern for .NET. As a developer, it helps you create decoupled applications that are easier to maintain, extend, scale and test.https://particular.net/nservicebus Tech Champ ?.
column6: is an implementation of a 'service bus' pattern for .NET. As a developer, it helps you create decoupled applications that are easier to maintain, extend, scale and test.

column5: Jira is a proprietary issue tracking product developed by Atlassian that allows bug tracking and agile project management. Tech Champ Kate.

column5: SpecFlow Runner is a powerful test runner for SpecFlow that further boosts your automation productivity. But it does not play well with .Net 6https://specflow.org/tools/runner/ Tech Champ ?.

column5: Soap UI is an open-source web service testing application for service-oriented architectures and representational state transfers. Its functionality covers web service inspection, invoking, development, simulation and mocking, functional testing, load and compliance testing. Tech Champ ?.
